section.title: Ender IO
section.p: Welcome to the most incomplete guide to Ender IO.

section.title: Getting started
section.p: Getting started with Ender IO isn't hard but you might want to get some mining done first. You need some iron, cobblestone, a furnace or three, flint and access to the bedrock layer.

Start with making Flint & Steel. Then go down to bedrock layer and set fire to some blocks of bedrock. It won't damage the bedrock---after all it is infinite---but with some luck tiny Grains of Infinity will split off.

section.title: Making a Thing
section.p: Now that you have Grains of Infinity, you can craft the first item you'll need: The Simple Machine Chassis.
